```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Loading the data.
```{r}
conflicts_india <- read_csv('relevant_data_years_type.csv')
```

Summing the number of deaths per incident. 
```{r}

total_deaths_india <- conflicts_india %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(Best = sum(best),
            Low = sum(low),
            High = sum(high)) %>%
  mutate(
    High = High/1000,
    Low = Low/1000,
    Best = Best/1000
  )
```

Making a plot of the incidents over the years.
```{r}
ggplot(total_deaths_india) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = year, y = Best)) +
  ylab("Fatalities (x1000)") + xlab('Estimation')
```
